existing_features.title: Deploy the Face Recognition Attendance App (FaceAttend) to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible via a live URL. Ensure both the frontend and backend canisters are deployed to the IC mainnet network.

Fix the student registration feature so that an admin can successfully register a new student by submitting the registration form (name, student ID, and photo) in the RegisterStudent component without errors.

projectName: Publish app to mainnet and make it publicly accessible
